body:
But, also, goc@ is not receiving email to these lists from what I can tell.  Could you make me the owner of them please?

 

Kyle Gross

Open Science Grid Operations

Operations Support Manager

Indiana University Research Technologies

 

 

From: Tim Cartwright <notifications@github.com>
Reply-To: opensciencegrid/docs <reply@reply.github.com>
Date: Wednesday, November 1, 2017 at 5:18 PM
To: opensciencegrid/docs <docs@noreply.github.com>
Cc: "Gross, Kyle Anthony" <kagross@iu.edu>, Mention <mention@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [opensciencegrid/docs] Change goc@ to help@ for support-related requests. (#235)

 

Both help@ and support@ are mailing lists at Fermilab. Each one has a single subscriber, which is goc@.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.
